Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Provides for cost of living adjustments for certain retirees
Summary: Decreases the time period before certain retirees receive a cost of living adjustment to their benefits.
LawCode: Amd §§78-a & 378-a, R & SS L; amd §532-a, Ed L; amd §13-696, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, the education law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to cost of living adjustments for certain retirees
